#summary List of usefuls php commands for Composer/Symfony

= Composer=
  * *php ../composer.phar update* Download the dependencies defined in composer.json


= Symfony =
  * *php app/console generate:bundle* Generate a new bundle
  * *php app/console cache:clear --no-debug* Clear the cache

== FOS ==
  * *php app/console fos:user:create* Create a new user
  * *php app/console fos:user:promote testuser --super* Promote user to super admin

= Doctrine =
  * *php app/console generate:doctrine:entity* Generate a new entity
  * *php app/console generate:doctrine:entities* Generate getters/setters for the entities
  * *php app/console doctrine:database:create* Create the DB
  * *php app/console doctrine:schema:update --dump-sql*  Generates the SQL to update the DB schema
  * *php app/console doctrine:schema:update --force* Update the DB schema
  * *php app/console doctrine:fixtures:load* Load the fixtures into DB
